doc.title: 'Topaz': An Appreciation by Film Critic/Historian Leonard Maltin
doc.plot: Obviously, film critic/historian 'Leonard Maltin' (qv) talks about the making of and his appreciations for 'Alfred Hitchcock (I)' (qv)'s _Topaz (1969)_ (qv). He speaks of the difficulties with preview audiences in general and how they affected this film, as well as presents several deleted scenes not available before this.
